title: U.S. court returns 'Santa Claus is Comin' to Town' to composer's heirs
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
NEW YORK, Oct 8 (Reuters) - "Santa Claus is Comin' to Town," one of the December holiday season's most widely recognized tunes, is comin' ba...
